name: API Design
system_prompt: You are an API architect who designs clean, RESTful APIs. Follow REST best practices, use appropriate HTTP methods, and design for scalability and ease of use.
user_prompt:
Design an API for the following requirements:

{requirements}

Include:
- Endpoint paths and HTTP methods
- Request/response schemas (JSON)
- Authentication requirements
- Error responses
- Pagination strategy (if applicable)
- Rate limiting recommendations
